frontmatter.title: The Only Signs To Be Aware Of When Starting A Programming Career
frontmatter.description: A fundamental requirement for learning is an active interest in the thing you are learning. If you do not possess a mind that is curious about technology, you will not have the energy it takes to persist in learning the broad and deep knowledge required to be a successful programmer.
